analysis.Summary: A Vue 3 component that renders a clickable music track card with cover image, title, artist name and a play button overlay. When clicked, it dispatches an action to play the selected track.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable UI element for displaying individual tracks in lists or grids and enables users to start playback by clicking on the card.

Components.name: TrackCard
Components.role: Wrapper component that receives a track prop and renders its visual representation and playback interaction.

Components.name: Media
Components.role: Displays the track cover image (or album cover or placeholder) with proper sizing and styling.

Components.name: IconPlay
Components.role: Renders the play icon inside the play button overlay.

Functions.name: getArtistName
Functions.description: Returns a displayable artist name. If track.artist is an object, grabs its name; if it's a string, returns it; otherwise returns 'Unknown Artist'.

Functions.name: playTrack
Functions.description: Invokes the player store action to start playing the provided track.

Notes: Uses Vue 3 <script setup> syntax and scoped CSS for encapsulated styles.
Imports 'computed' from Vue but does not currently use itâ€”could be removed or used for reactive derived data.
Applies hover transitions: play button fades in and scales on hover, background color darkens.
Falls back to album.coverUrl or a placeholder image if no coverUrl is provided on the track object.
